title: How to Make an Apple Honey Shake

steps.headline: Measure and pour the juice and honey into a blender.
Add the orange rind into the blender.
Blend on a medium speed for a few seconds.
Pour the blended mixture over the ice.

text: Prepare all of the ingredients.  Measure and pour the juice and honey into a blender.  Add the orange rind into the blender.  Blend on a medium speed for a few seconds.  Add ice cubes to glasses.  Pour the blended mixture over the ice.  Finished.
